CustomField.description: Ask whether the person filling out is a parent or student. This will helps when a parent is signing up for a student to come to an event (we then capture both sets of data).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Ask whether the person filling out is a parent or student. This will helps when a parent is signing up for a student to come to an event (we then capture both sets of data).
CustomField.label: Ask If Parent
